name: DepotLocation
description: Represents the physical location of a depot.

properties.name: complement
properties.description: Additional address information, such as apartment or suite number.

properties.name: city
properties.description: City where the depot is located.

properties.name: postalCode
properties.description: Postal or ZIP code of the depot.

properties.name: country
properties.description: Country where the depot is located.
